details.title: The Effect of Aircraft Lateral Dynamics on Aircraft Positioning Accuracy When Using Loran-C
details.abstract: The dynamics of an aircraft following a fixed course line using Loran-C for position fixing are shown to interact with Loran-C receiver dynamics to result in cross-track aircraft positioning errors that are smaller than cross-track Loran receiver errors. In a particular case considered, this error reduction is on the order of 50 percent.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
